attributes.action: Build more council houses in Northamptonshire instead of private houses!!
attributes.additional_details: Everything is so expensive now and most people can't afford to have a private house so they go to the council for help but instead of getting a house they end up being on an extremely long waiting list. This  would not happen if there was more council houses.
attributes.background: Northamptonshire needs more council houses. It's ridiculous how many people are on the waiting list for a council houses because they can't afford to go private. If there was more council houses built instead of private houses or houses for sale then there will be less people homeless.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning and housing issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
